text: Fernando Henrique Cardoso (; born June 18, 1931), also known by his initials FHC () is a Brazilian politician. He was the 34th President of Brazil. He served for two terms from January 1, 1995 to December 31, 2002. ==Related pages== *List of Brazilian scientists ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Brazil Category:Politicians from Rio de Janeiro
title: Fernando Henrique Cardoso
